All Classes

Class
Description
GymEnvServer<Observation>
Deploy an instance of IJavaGymEnv as a server that can respond to requests from a Python-side client.
GymEnvServer.TrainingCommand
 
IJavaGymEnv<Observation>
An interface allowing an AI-gym-env a la OpenAI Gym-env to be implemented in Java.
IStatefulGame<State>
A StatefulGame is just a generic representation of a stateful environment.
JapyreTrainer<ModelConfiguration,​State>
A trainer is used to train a model (or a policy, depending of the used training algorithm) on a "problem" formulated as a StatefulGame.
JapyreTrainer.StateInfo<St>
A class to wrap state-information to be sent to the Python-side training-server.
JExecutor<Observation>
This class implement a Java-client that can be used to query a trained model at the Python-side.
ObjectReaderWriter_OverSocket
Provide a convenient reader/writer to read and write objects over a socket.
RLStepData<Observation>
Just a tuple of (observation,reward,...) that a GymEnv step-function needs to construct; see IJavaGymEnv.step(String).
SendCommandClient
A class that supports sending a pair (cmd,arg) to a server and receives the response the server sends.
SendCommandClient.A
 
SendCommandClient.Cmd
 
SendCommandClient.SomeClass
 
SocketJsonReaderWriterzzz
Provide a reader/writer to a socket to communicate with a server.
SquareWorld
This class provides a simple example implementation of IJavaGymEnv.
SquareWorld.Location
 
SquareWorldGymServer
Run the main-method of this class to wrap an instance of SquareWorld Gym and deploys it as a server that responds to requests from the Python-side.
TrainingConfiguration
Representing parameters to be sent to the Python-side RL before we run a training session.
